text.value: **Veuillez sensibiliser la femme sur la PF**
Have you been made aware of PF?
Have you already used a method?
Are you currently on this method?
Would you like to change method?
Would you like to repeat the method?
Date must be in the future
When will the method be renewed?
Why do you want to renew the method anymore?
Which method would you like to use?
How long does the method last?
How long does the method last?
The value must be between 1 and 29
The value must be a positive integer
Does the administered method start today?
What is the start date of the method?
Why was the method not administered?
Reason for not renewing the method: ****
Please refer the woman to a health facility for **FP** method not available
Enter the name of the reference health facility
You must do the side effects control on: ****
You must renew this method on: ****
The reference follow-up visit is in **3 days**
**Veuillez sensibiliser la femme sur la PF**
La femme a t-elle été sensibilisé sur la PF ?
Pourquoi la sensibilisation n'a pas été faite ?
Avez-vous déjà utilisée une méthode PF?
La date doit être au futur
Quelle est la date de renouvellement de la méthode ?
Pourquoi vous ne voulez plus renouveler la méthode ?
Quel est la Durée de la méthode ?
Quel est la Durée de la méthode ?
La valeurdoit être comprise entre 1 et 29
La valeur doit être un entier positif
Quel est la quantité de condoms donnée
La méthode administrée démarre t'il aujourd'hui?
Quelle est la date de démarrage de la méthode ?
Pourquoi la méthode n'a pas été administrée ?
Raison du non renouvellement de la méthode : ****
Veuillez référer la femme pour sa **PF**
Selectionner le centre de santé de référence
Saisir le nom de la formation sanitaire de référence
Vous devez faire le contrôle des effets secondaires le : ****
Vous devez renouveler cette méthode le : ****
La visite de suivi référence est dans **3 jours**

bind.calculate: concat(concat( /family_planning/patient_age_in_years , if( /family_planning/patient_age_in_years =1,' an et ',' ans et ')),concat( /family_planning/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /family_planning/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' mois',' mois')))

concat(concat( /family_planning/patient_age_in_years , if( /family_planning/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')),concat( /family_planning/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /family_planning/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')))

if( /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'male' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'homme' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'Homme', 'Male', if( /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'female' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'femme' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'Femme', 'Female', ''))

if( /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'male' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'homme' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'Homme', 'Masculin', if( /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'female' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'femme' or /family_planning/inputs/contact/sex = 'Femme', 'Féminin', ''))

if(../method_already_used = 'tubal_ligation','false',if(../has_counseling = 'true' and ((../is_method_avaible_reco = 'false' or ../is_method_avaible_reco = 'true') and (../method_was_given = 'false' and (../method_not_given_reason = 'on_break' or ../method_not_given_reason = 'side_effect') or ../who_will_give_method = 'health_center' or ../has_changed_method = 'false' and ../want_renew_method = 'true' and ../want_renew_method_date != '' and ../want_renew_method_date <= today())),'true','false'))

bind.relevant: ../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and ((../c_already_use_method = 'no' or ../c_want_change_method = 'yes') and ../c_new_method_wanted != '' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no') and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

bind.calculate: if(../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and ((../c_already_use_method = 'no' or ../c_want_change_method = 'yes') and ../c_new_method_wanted != '' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no'),../c_who_will_give_method_selected,if(../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'false' and ((../c_already_use_method = 'no' or ../c_want_change_method = 'yes') and ../c_new_method_wanted != '' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no'),'health_center',''))

bind.relevant: ../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and /family_planning/fp_method != 'dmpa_sc' and /family_planning/fp_method != 'condoms' and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and /family_planning/fp_method != 'dmpa_sc' and /family_planning/fp_method = 'condoms' and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and /family_planning/fp_method != 'dmpa_sc' and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_months_count = 0 and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and /family_planning/is_method_avaible_reco = 'true' and /family_planning/fp_method != 'dmpa_sc' and /family_planning/fp_method = 'condoms' and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'

../c_has_counseling = 'yes' and ../c_who_will_give_method = 'reco' and (../c_already_use_method= 'no' or ../c_currently_using_method = 'no' or ../c_already_use_method= 'yes' and (../c_want_change_method = 'yes' or ../c_want_renew_method = 'yes' and ../c_want_renew_method_date = today())) and ../c_method_was_given = 'yes' and ../c_method_start_today = 'no' and ../c_method_already_used != 'tubal_ligation'
